text: Tomaloke koraa, â€˜ami imana anicho allahara prati arau yi amara prati aratirna haiche lagate tara prati'o imana anicho yi aratirna haiche ibraahima, ichama'ila, ichahakba, iyakuba arau te'omra bansadharasakalara prati, arau mucha, icha lagate an'yan'ya nabisakalaka te'omlokara pratipalakara taraphara paraa yi pradana karaa haiche (tara prati'o imana anicho). Ami te'omlokara majata kono parthakya nakarao; arau ami te'omrae'i ocarata atmasamarpanakarai
